p.d: Maxime comes out of the coma and reveals the murderer's name to Angele. Shocked by the revelation, she decides to say nothing, convinced that he's lying. Meanwhile, those around Angele question her lucidity. Commissioner Favard, having discovered that she had hidden the truth from him, takes her off the case... Directed by: Vincent Lannoo (France, 2018) Screenplay: Jeanne Le Guillou, Bruno Dega Cast: Noémie Schmidt (Angele Maury), Béatrice Dalle (Élisabeth Favard), Hippolyte Girardot (Raphaël Santi), Judith El Zein (Alexandra Santi), Samuel Theis (Simon), Grégoire Leprince-Ringuet (Maxime), Mylene Demongeot (Rose), Achille Ridolfi (Louis), Émilie Dequenne (Camille), Scali Delpeyrat (Guillaume), Florence Thomassin (Valérie), Antoine Gouy (Bastien), Jérémy Gillet (Arnaud), Yaël Abecassis (Iris Galmont) Genre: detective Awards: Pyrénées d'Or prize for the best mini-series, audience prize for the best mini-series, 2019 Luchon Festival for Television Creation. Parental guidance: TV-PG
